trans-unit.source: Download and install the Rights Management sharing application
trans-unit.target: Download and install the Rights Management sharing application

trans-unit.source: You do not have to be a local administrator to install the RMS sharing application.
trans-unit.target: You do not have to be a local administrator to install the RMS sharing application.

trans-unit.source: However, if you are not and you use Office 2010, there are some limitations.
trans-unit.target: However, if you are not and you use Office 2010, there are some limitations.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <link><linkText>If you are not a local administrator and use Office 2010</linkText><title></title></link> section in this topic.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see the <link><linkText>If you are not a local administrator and use Office 2010</linkText><title></title></link> section in this topic.

trans-unit.source: To download and install the Rights Management sharing application
trans-unit.target: To download and install the Rights Management sharing application

trans-unit.source: Go to the <link><linkText>Microsoft Rights Management</linkText><title></title></link> page on the Microsoft website.
trans-unit.target: Go to the <link><linkText>Microsoft Rights Management</linkText><title></title></link> page on the Microsoft website.

trans-unit.source: In the Computers section, click the icon for the RMS app for Windows and save the Setup.exe file to install Microsoft Rights Management sharing application.
trans-unit.target: In the Computers section, click the icon for the RMS app for Windows and save the Setup.exe file to install Microsoft Rights Management sharing application.

trans-unit.source: Double-click the Setup.exe file that was downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Double-click the Setup.exe file that was downloaded.

trans-unit.source: If you are prompted to continue, click Yes.
trans-unit.target: If you are prompted to continue, click Yes.

trans-unit.source: On the Setup Microsoft RMS page, click Next, and wait for the installation to finish.
trans-unit.target: On the Setup Microsoft RMS page, click Next, and wait for the installation to finish.

trans-unit.source: The RMS sharing application requires the Microsoft .NET Framework, minimum version 4.0.
trans-unit.target: The RMS sharing application requires the Microsoft .NET Framework, minimum version 4.0.

trans-unit.source: Setup checks to see whether this is installed and if it is not, you will see a message with a link to install it.
trans-unit.target: Setup checks to see whether this is installed and if it is not, you will see a message with a link to install it.

trans-unit.source: When the installation finishes, click Restart to restart your computer and complete the installation.
trans-unit.target: When the installation finishes, click Restart to restart your computer and complete the installation.

trans-unit.source: Or, click Close and restart your computer later to complete the installation.
trans-unit.target: Or, click Close and restart your computer later to complete the installation.

trans-unit.source: You’re now ready to start protecting your files or read files that others have protected.
trans-unit.target: You’re now ready to start protecting your files or read files that others have protected.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>If you are not a local administrator and use Office 2010
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>If you are not a local administrator and use Office 2010

trans-unit.source: If you sign in to your computer and do not have local administrative rights, and Setup detects that you have Office 2010 installed, you will see a warning message that some scenarios will not work with this configuration.
trans-unit.target: If you sign in to your computer and do not have local administrative rights, and Setup detects that you have Office 2010 installed, you will see a warning message that some scenarios will not work with this configuration.

trans-unit.source: The scenarios are:
trans-unit.target: The scenarios are:

trans-unit.source: If your organization uses Azure RMS rather than an on-premises version of RMS:
trans-unit.target: If your organization uses Azure RMS rather than an on-premises version of RMS:

trans-unit.source: The Information Rights Management (IRM) features of Office will not be available.
trans-unit.target: The Information Rights Management (IRM) features of Office will not be available.

trans-unit.source: For example, the Do Not Forward option for emails, and the Restrict Access permissions that you can set from the File menu in Word and Excel.
trans-unit.target: For example, the Do Not Forward option for emails, and the Restrict Access permissions that you can set from the File menu in Word and Excel.

trans-unit.source: You can use the Share Protected option on the ribbon, and the right-click options from File Explorer.
trans-unit.target: You can use the Share Protected option on the ribbon, and the right-click options from File Explorer.

trans-unit.source: If your organization uses an on-premises version of RMS rather than Azure RMS:
trans-unit.target: If your organization uses an on-premises version of RMS rather than Azure RMS:

trans-unit.source: You won’t be able to read a protected document sent to you by somebody from another organization that’s using Azure RMS.
trans-unit.target: You won’t be able to read a protected document sent to you by somebody from another organization that’s using Azure RMS.

trans-unit.source: If you are not a local administrator and use Office 365 or Office 2013, you do not see this message and these scenarios are supported.
trans-unit.target: If you are not a local administrator and use Office 365 or Office 2013, you do not see this message and these scenarios are supported.

trans-unit.source: You can continue the installation with these known limitations.
trans-unit.target: You can continue the installation with these known limitations.

trans-unit.source: Or you can stop the installation and either rerun it with the Run as administrator option when you run Setup.exe in step 3, or ask an administrator to install it for you.
trans-unit.target: Or you can stop the installation and either rerun it with the Run as administrator option when you run Setup.exe in step 3, or ask an administrator to install it for you.

trans-unit.source: Administrators can <link><linkText>script this installation</linkText><title></title></link> for you so that it installs automatically.
trans-unit.target: Administrators can <link><linkText>script this installation</linkText><title></title></link> for you so that it installs automatically.

trans-unit.source: Examples and other instructions
trans-unit.target: Examples and other instructions
